pkgmetadata.longdescription: Coefficient of Variation (CV) with Confidence Intervals (CI) // Provides some easy-to-use functions and classes to calculate variability measures such as coefficient of variation with confidence intervals provided with all available methods. References are Panichkitkosolkul (2013) doi:10.1155/2013/324940 , Altunkaynak Gamgam (2018) doi:10.1080/03610918.2018.1435800 , Albatineh, Kibria, Wilcox Zogheib (2014) doi:10.1080/02664763.2013.847405 .
